subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. won a rain-delayed race at Daytona International Speedway, but a last-lap accident left drivers fearing for Austin Dillon’s safety.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. won a rain-delayed race at Daytona International Speedway, but a last-lap accident left drivers fearing for Austin Dillon’s safety.
